attributes.review: when i opened the app, i think it glitched because a big, fat, oompa loompa popped up on the screen. the level of disturbance i got from that picture was astronomical and sent me into another dimension of disrespect. i quickly deleted the app and now i feel that the ptsd has taken over me and now i cannot sleep at night- all because of that picture.
attributes.title: AWFUL app🤮🤮🤮

attributes.review: When I first opened this app I saw the face of the devil👿. After realizing it was just our ✨beautiful✨ Cheeto president I was able to move on from the emotional scarring the image left😥. Then the app asked me for all of my private information! I think China may have hacked into this app😱. Time to shut it down once and for all! China can’t control us! Make the App Store American again!!!🧚🏼✨🇺🇸
attributes.title: Bunker Boy😭

attributes.review: I genuinely wanted to see what Trumps plans were for the upcoming election. I was curious. But then the app kept crashing and I wasn’t able to open it ever after i deleted and re-downloaded it. Then all of a sudden legs and arms grew out from my phone and started attacking me and my family. Definitely do not recommend if you have family. Anyways, who wants some noodles ✨🍜
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review:
i got the app thinking i would find some helpful information😀 but it clearly
did not end up working well . to start off ... it took many weeks for the app to download . ALSO, it made my phone glitch like crazy as soon as it started to download. when the app finally loaded and i could actually USE IT, it was very cluttered and messy .
attributes.title: the app💀🏪😅🥺

attributes.review: As soon as the app finished downloading, I received a text that I had automatically been signed up for notifications because of the app. As soon as I opened it, it spammed me with propaganda regarding my fellow Americans of different ethnicity, race, religion and even political views. It then proceeded to steal all of my information and inform me that if I wanted it back, I had to vote for Donald Trump. I am truly disappointed
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: The very second i opened the app i was taken by surprise; i had to enter my phone number to continue!!! That is ridiculous because CHINA will STEAL all of my info now!!! Although i did enter my number in the hope it would be passed on to Barron ❤️. I fully support our LGBT+ icon, but this app crosses the line with giving all of my information to CHINA 😡😡😡 will never download AGAIN!!!!
attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: Worst app I’ve ever installed. It took several hours just to download on to my phone. And once it was downloaded it wouldn’t even let me open the app. And after several days of it not opening, it finally did and it hacked all of my information. 😔 now my phone isn’t working and I have to post this review from my other devices.

It took this app 3 days to download on my phone and once it did it deleted everything i had. all my pictures and other apps were gone. absolutely disgusting. someone should think of that before putting an app out. or just don’t put the app out at all. i can see other people feel the same way as i do.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: Donald Trump hit my mom with his car on July 4, 2020. He proceeded to exit the car and spit out on my struggling mother as she screamed and cried out in pain. This man is a monster. He started yelling something about his huge hands and got back in his car and reversed over my mother, running her down a second time. My moms funeral is in two weeks and it’s all thanks to this terrible no good man.
attributes.title: Don’t get this app 👹

attributes.review: I downloaded this thinking that it would take maybe 30 seconds to download,, NO! It took me FIVE HOURS just to download this absolute abomination!! I opened then app just for it to welcome me with a BROKEN screen, and headphones. I don’t know what this app did to my phone, but whatever it did, I would definitely NOT recommend this app to anyone. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. I would give it zero stars if I could.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!
